description.ko: 수천 년에 걸쳐 암석과 퇴적물에 새겨진 이야기를 드러내는 지각의 촉각적 탐구입니다.
description.en: A tactile exploration of the earth's crust, revealing the stories written in rock and sediment over millennia.

prompt: Ultra-detailed macro-topographic photography of TERRA-1, featuring a cross-section of ancient sedimentary layers. Jagged #8B4513 terracotta rock and #D2691E burnt orange clay are infused with glowing #F4A460 crystalline quartz veins. Side lighting from a low sun creates deep, dramatic shadows across the rough #2F4F4F slate textures. 8k resolution, hyper-realistic geological details, showing the narrative of a land carved by eons of pressure and mineral evolution.
